Text:
I will get the version with the hard coded subs, as I always have problems burning soft sub versions. 

thanks for mentioning it. I missed it when you posted it.

do u have any other hard subbed movies?

We do have Victor Victoria versions posted with the same style of subs - however they are
to be improved upon soon based on our most recent posting of the 2GB version (similar quality).
Thank you for your comment - we also plan to bring you Et Dukkenjem this way as it remains the most favorite of my movies of Europe - where the best of movie ideas originate universally. (Beau Pere will soon come in better bitrates too this way)
use magnet link above to download this torrent - due to a techie glutch - merci

Kindly note that the english srt was saved as unicode srt format by the subrip program - instantly convert to utf-8 using the free subtitles editor program if need be. (or ansi format if you prefer) - sorry about that - we also have the english srt available separately if you wish
